meanings.definition: Attempted to sell or promote something aggressively.
meanings.sent1: The salesman touted the new product to everyone in the store.
meanings.sent2: She touted her skills in the job interview.
meanings.sent3: The cat touted its hunting prowess by bringing a toy mouse to its owner.
meanings.sent4: The politician touted his plan as the key to solving all problems.
meanings.sent5: The chef touted the special dish as a culinary masterpiece.

meanings.sent1: The fans touted the singer's performance all over social media.
meanings.sent2: He touted the book as the best he had ever read.
meanings.sent3: The kids touted their favorite cartoon character as the coolest ever.
meanings.sent4: She touted her friend's artwork as the most creative she had seen.
meanings.sent5: The teacher touted the student's essay as exceptional.
